Instructions

Below are a set of computer generated questions and corresponding answers related to a table on Wikipedia.

Please paraphrase, in natural English, the generated question by rewriting it using your own words such that the answer does not change. Try to be original so as to not copy the generated paraphrase shown. Below, you will find some examples of good paraphrases and bad paraphrases. For your convenience, we have highlighted words that correspond to table column names in blue. These words have a tendency to sound awkward, in which case please try to rephrase them in particular.

Once finished, please click the "Submit" button (scroll down) to submit your work. Your paraphrase will be examined by a human to make sure that it is original and correct. After this, you will receive your payment. If the question is very confusing or the table is very difficult to interpret, just try your best and leave a comment in the feedback section.

Your work will greatly contribute to research in automatic information extraction from tables. Thank you for your help!

Examples

Title: The Dalek Invasion of Earth: Serial details by episode

Question to rephrase what are all the viewers (in millions) where archive is 16mm t/r and episode is " world's end "
Good how many millions of people watched the episodes that were taped on 16mm archive and titled "world's end?
Bad how many viewers (in millions) watched episdoes where archive is 16mm t/r and episode is " world's end "
Why this is bad it is too close to the original

Title: The Dalek Invasion of Earth: Serial details by episode

Question to rephrase what is the total number of season no. where original airdate is 6november2011
Good how many seasons were originally aired on november 6th, 2011?
Bad how many seasons were aired in november?
Why this is bad it has a different meaning because november can be in any year and have any date, not just november 6th, 2011

Title: Zina Garrison: Doubles: 46 (20–26)

Question to rephrase what are all the date where surface is carpet (i) and outcome is winner
Good list the dates when Zina Garrison played on carpet curface and won.
Bad select dates, surface=carpet & output=winner
Why this is bad it is not a natural sentence

Title: 2006 AFL season: Round 7

Question to rephrase what are all the home team score where date is 14 may and away team is essendon
Good how many points did the home team score on may 14 against essendon?
Bad score vs. essendon
Why this is bad this does not have the same meaning in that it does not have a date and it is not clear whose score it is asking for.

Title: List of Oregon ballot measures: 1976 General Election

Question to rephrase what are all the passed where meas. num. is smaller than 3.1827829895505158 and % yes is 29.61%
Good did the measure with a number less than 3.18 and 29.61% yes vote pass?
Bad which measure passed with a number less than 3.18 and where 29.61% of the people voted yes?
Why this is bad the original question asks for the pass status of the measure, but the bad example asks for the measures that passed.

Task

Title: List of cities, towns and villages in Vojvodina -

Settlement Cyrillic Name Other Names Type Population (2011) Largest ethnic group (2002) Dominant religion (2002)
Settlement Cyrillic Name Other Names Type Population (2011) Largest ethnic group (2002) Dominant religion (2002)
Odžaci Оџаци town 8810 Serbs Orthodox Christianity
Bački Brestovac Бачки Брестовац village 2819 Serbs Orthodox Christianity
Bački Gračac Бачки Грачац village 2286 Serbs Orthodox Christianity
Bogojevo Богојево (Hungarian: Gombos) village 1744 Hungarians Catholic Christianity
Deronje Дероње village 2487 Serbs Orthodox Christianity
Karavukovo Каравуково village 4215 Serbs Orthodox Christianity
Lalić Лалић (Slovak: Laliť) village 1343 Slovaks Protestantism
Ratkovo Ратково village 3411 Serbs Orthodox Christianity

Question 1

Question to rephrase:

  • what are all the settlement where largest ethnic group (2002) is slovaks

Answers:

  • Lalić
Rewrite

Question 2

Question to rephrase:

  • what are all the settlement where type is town

Answers:

  • Odžaci
Rewrite

Question 3

Question to rephrase:

  • what are all the type where cyrillic name other names is оџаци

Answers:

  • town
Rewrite

Question 4

Question to rephrase:

  • what are all the cyrillic name other names where settlement is ratkovo

Answers:

  • Ратково
Rewrite

Question 5

Question to rephrase:

  • what are all the settlement where dominant religion (2002) is orthodox christianity and type is village and cyrillic name other names is ратково

Answers:

  • Ratkovo
Rewrite

Question 6

Question to rephrase:

  • what are all the largest ethnic group (2002) where cyrillic name other names is дероње

Answers:

  • Serbs
Rewrite
